protocol_name: ADBS Whole Exome Sequencing (WES) Analysis Pipeline
protocol_name_html: ADBS Whole Exome Sequencing (WES) Analysis Pipeline
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"e15ov","text":"Integrated Whole Exome Sequencing (WES) analysis pipline using various tools and databases, developed as part of the Accelerator program for Discovery in Brain disorders using Stem cells (ADBS) program at National Centre for Biological Sciences (NCBS), Bangalore.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
protocol_affiliation: ADBS, National Centre for Biological Sciences (NCBS)
manuscript_citation: Suhas Ganesh, Husayn Ahmed P, Ravi Kumar Nadella, Ravi Prabhakar More, Manasa Sheshadri, Biju Viswanath, Mahendra Rao, Sanjeev Jain, The ADBS consortium, Odity Mukherjee, 2018. Exome sequencing in families with severe mental illness identifies novel and rare variants in genes implicated in Mendelian neuropsychiatric syndromes. Psychiatry and Clinical Neurosciences. doi:10.1111/pcn.12788
keywords: Whole Exome Sequencing, WES, NGS data analysis pipeline,

authors_list.name: Ravi More
authors_list.affiliation: ADBS, National Centre for Biological Sciences (NCBS)

status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"72f7t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1hhgb","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"2emhu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":5145,"guid":"E6048AE0ECA011E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","align":null,"name":"gunzip $SAMPLE_PATH\/$SAMPLE_NAME\/$SAMPLE_NAME*.fq.gz","description":"","os_name":"Linux","os_version":"","can_edit":true,"step_guid":"AAC4D930ECA011E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","command":""}}],"guid":"AAC4D930ECA011E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","id":684400,"previous_guid":"272A4670EC9E11E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","section":"Unzip the raw reads files from .gz to fastq format"}
steps.section: Unzip the raw reads files from .gz to fastq format

steps.data:
{"blocks":[{"key":"ehc0k","text":"Software versions used: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1o85c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"573kn","text":"FASTQC version 0.10.1 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ci1g2","text":"Prinseq-lite version 0.20.4","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cmfq5","text":"AfterQC version 0.9.6","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3l2g7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"dg986","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":5146,"guid":"8CC71FF0ECA111E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","align":null,"name":"$SOFTWARE_PATH/FastQC/fastqc $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_R1.fq

$SOFTWARE_PATH/FastQC/fastqc $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_R2.fq

cd $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/

python $SOFTWARE_PATH/AfterQC-master/after.py -f -1 -t -1 -q 20 -1 $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_R1.fq -2 $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_R2.fq

$SOFTWARE_PATH/prinseq-lite-0.20.4/prinseq-lite.pl -fastq $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/good/$SAMPLE_NAME\_R1.good.fq -fastq2 $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/good/$SAMPLE_NAME\_R2.good.fq -out_good $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/cleaned -out_bad null -min_qual_mean 20

mv $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/cleaned_1.fastq $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_cleaned_R1.fastq

mv $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/cleaned_2.fastq $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_cleaned_R2.fastq

$SOFTWARE_PATH/FastQC/fastqc $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_cleaned_R1.fastq

$SOFTWARE_PATH/FastQC/fastqc $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_cleaned_R2.fastq

mkdir -p $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/Report_$SAMPLE_NAME\_4_FASTQC

mv $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_cleaned_R1_fastqc.zip $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/Report_$SAMPLE_NAME\_4_FASTQC/$SAMPLE_NAME\_cleaned_R1_fastqc.zip

mv $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_cleaned_R2_fastqc.zip $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/Report_$SAMPLE_NAME\_4_FASTQC/$SAMPLE_NAME\_cleaned_R2_fastqc.zip","description":"","os_name":"Linux","os_version":"","can_edit":true,"step_guid":"F6518420ECA011E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","command":""}}],"guid":"F6518420ECA011E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","id":684406,"previous_guid":"AAC4D930ECA011E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","section":"QC check of R1 and R2 paired-end raw reads using FASTQC, Trimming poor quality reads using Prinseq-lite, and Adapter contimination removal using AfterQC, "}
steps.section: QC check of R1 and R2 paired-end raw reads using FASTQC, Trimming poor quality reads using Prinseq-lite, and Adapter contimination removal using AfterQC,

steps.data:
{"blocks":[{"key":"9kujq","text":"BWA version 0.5.9","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"65rad","text":"Samtools version 1.3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"80pkk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"25ai9","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"eat43","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":5147,"guid":"CF6DF5E0ECA111E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","align":null,"name":"$SOFTWARE_PATH/bwa-0.5.9/bwa aln -t 30 $DATABASES_PATH/hg19_fa-chrMlast/hg19_chrM-last.fa $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_cleaned_R1.fastq > $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_R1.sai

$SOFTWARE_PATH/bwa-0.5.9/bwa aln -t 30 $DATABASES_PATH/hg19_fa-chrMlast/hg19_chrM-last.fa $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_cleaned_R2.fastq > $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_R2.sai

$SOFTWARE_PATH/bwa-0.5.9/bwa sampe $DATABASES_PATH/hg19_fa-chrMlast/hg19_chrM-last.fa $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_R1.sai $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_R2.sai $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_cleaned_R1.fastq $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_cleaned_R2.fastq > $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME.sam

$SOFTWARE_PATH/samtools1.3/bin/samtools view -bS $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME.sam > $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME.bam

$SOFTWARE_PATH/samtools1.3/bin/samtools sort $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME.bam -o $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_sorted.bam

$SOFTWARE_PATH/samtools1.3/bin/samtools flagstat $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_sorted.bam > $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_sorted_flagstat.txt

$SOFTWARE_PATH/samtools1.3/bin/samtools index $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_sorted.bam > $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_sortedbam.bai","description":"","os_name":"Linux","os_version":"","can_edit":true,"step_guid":"A2CCF130ECA111E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","command":""}}],"guid":"A2CCF130ECA111E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","id":684407,"previous_guid":"F6518420ECA011E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","section":"Alignment of clened raw reads against Human Reference Genome hg19 GRCh37.p13 build using BWA and SAMTOOLS."}
steps.section: Alignment of clened raw reads against Human Reference Genome hg19 GRCh37.p13 build using BWA and SAMTOOLS.

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"5qu0","text":"Picard version 2.0.1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9729f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3bp40","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"2pjlq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":5148,"guid":"0EEF9700ECA211E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","align":null,"name":"java -Djava.io.tmpdir=$TEMP_DIR -Xmx50g -jar $SOFTWARE_PATH\/picard\/build\/libs\/picard.jar AddOrReplaceReadGroups I=\"$SAMPLE_PATH\/$SAMPLE_NAME\/$SAMPLE_NAME\\_sorted.bam\" O=\"$SAMPLE_PATH\/$SAMPLE_NAME\/$SAMPLE_NAME\\_coordsort.bam\" ID=\"1\" LB=\"libraryname \" PL=\"ILLUMINA\" PU=\"platform unit\" SM=samplenname SO=coordinate VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=SILENT\n\njava -Djava.io.tmpdir=$TEMP_DIR -Xmx50g -jar $SOFTWARE_PATH\/picard\/build\/libs\/picard.jar MarkDuplicates I=\"$SAMPLE_PATH\/$SAMPLE_NAME\/$SAMPLE_NAME\\_coordsort.bam\" O=\"$SAMPLE_PATH\/$SAMPLE_NAME\/$SAMPLE_NAME\\_RMDUP.bam\" M=\"metrics\" REMOVE_DUPLICATES=true ASSUME_SORTED=true VALIDATION_STRINGENCY=LENIENT","description":"","os_name":"Linux","os_version":"","can_edit":true,"step_guid":"F3395230ECA111E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","command":""}}],"guid":"F3395230ECA111E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","id":684408,"previous_guid":"A2CCF130ECA111E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","section":"Mark PCR duplicates and sorting BAM using PICARD Tools"}
steps.section: Mark PCR duplicates and sorting BAM using PICARD Tools

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"6u1rr","text":"Samtools version 1.3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6tfo6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"66fcd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"fkgc2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":5149,"guid":"7F75BE00ECA211E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","align":null,"name":"$SOFTWARE_PATH\/samtools1.3\/bin\/samtools index $SAMPLE_PATH\/$SAMPLE_NAME\/$SAMPLE_NAME\\_RMDUP.bam","description":"","os_name":"Linux","os_version":"","can_edit":true,"step_guid":"76954030ECA211E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","command":""}}],"guid":"76954030ECA211E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","id":684409,"previous_guid":"F3395230ECA111E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","section":"Index the coordinate sorted bam file using SAMTOOLS"}
steps.section: Index the coordinate sorted bam file using SAMTOOLS

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"diru2","text":"GATK version 3.6","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"84all","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8t9a5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"76bs1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"158uf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":5150,"guid":"AB440960ECA211E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","align":null,"name":"java -Xmx8g -jar $SOFTWARE_PATH\/GenomeAnalysisTK-3.6\/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T RealignerTargetCreator -R $DATABASES_PATH\/hg19_fa-chrMlast\/hg19_chrM-last.fa -I $SAMPLE_PATH\/$SAMPLE_NAME\/$SAMPLE_NAME\\_RMDUP.bam --known $DATABASES_PATH\/REF_GENOME_hg19\/1000G_phase1.indels.hg19.vcf -o $SAMPLE_PATH\/$SAMPLE_NAME\/$SAMPLE_NAME\\_IndelRealigner.intervals \n\njava -Xmx30g -jar $SOFTWARE_PATH\/GenomeAnalysisTK-3.6\/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -T IndelRealigner -R $DATABASES_PATH\/hg19_fa-chrMlast\/hg19_chrM-last.fa -I $SAMPLE_PATH\/$SAMPLE_NAME\/$SAMPLE_NAME\\_RMDUP.bam -known $DATABASES_PATH\/REF_GENOME_hg19\/1000G_phase1.indels.hg19.vcf -targetIntervals $SAMPLE_PATH\/$SAMPLE_NAME\/$SAMPLE_NAME\\_IndelRealigner.intervals -o $SAMPLE_PATH\/$SAMPLE_NAME\/$SAMPLE_NAME\\_realignedBam.bam","description":"","os_name":"Linux","os_version":"","can_edit":true,"step_guid":"8657D3C0ECA211E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","command":""}}],"guid":"8657D3C0ECA211E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","id":684410,"previous_guid":"76954030ECA211E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","section":"INDEL re-alignment using GATK tools"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"35m1e","text":"Qualimap version 2.2.1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ek829","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"1hcmu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":5151,"guid":"C61915F0ECA211E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","align":null,"name":"mkdir -p $SAMPLE_PATH\/$SAMPLE_NAME\/Report_$SAMPLE\\_NAME_5_ALIGNMENT_QC\n\n$SOFTWARE_PATH\/qualimap_v2.2.1\/qualimap bamqc -bam $SAMPLE_PATH\/$SAMPLE_NAME\/$SAMPLE_NAME\\_realignedBam.bam -gff $DATABASES_PATH\/TruSeq_exome_targeted_regions.hg19.bed -outdir $SAMPLE_PATH\/$SAMPLE_NAME\/Report_$SAMPLE_NAME\\_5_ALIGNMENT_QC\/QualiMap_$SAMPLE_NAME\\_TruSeq_bed -outfile $SAMPLE_NAME\\_TruSeqbed.pdf --java-mem-size=8G","description":"","os_name":"Linux","os_version":"","can_edit":true,"step_guid":"BB470150ECA211E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","command":""}}],"guid":"BB470150ECA211E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","id":684411,"previous_guid":"8657D3C0ECA211E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","section":"Check the alignment QC of the bam file using Qualimap"}
steps.section: Check the alignment QC of the bam file using Qualimap

steps.data:
{"blocks":[{"key":"67qqf","text":"VarScan version 2.3.9","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"kebt","text":"Samtools version 1.3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cril6","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"cfmu4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":5152,"guid":"FD6F5870ECA211E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","align":null,"name":"$SOFTWARE_PATH/samtools1.3/bin/samtools mpileup -f $DATABASES_PATH/hg19_fa-chrMlast/hg19_chrM-last.fa $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_realignedBam.bam > $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_raw.mpileup

mkdir -p $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/Report_$SAMPLE_NAME\_13_VARIANT_CALLING

java -jar $SOFTWARE_PATH/VarScan.v2.3.9.jar mpileup2snp $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_raw.mpileup --min-var-freq 0.0025 --p-value 0.001 --min-avg-qual 20 --output-vcf > $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/Report_$SAMPLE_NAME\_13_VARIANT_CALLING/$SAMPLE_NAME\_snp_0.25freq_p0.001_qual_20.vcf

java -jar $SOFTWARE_PATH/VarScan.v2.3.9.jar mpileup2indel $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_raw.mpileup --min-var-freq 0.0025 --p-value 0.001 --min-avg-qual 20 --output-vcf > $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/Report_$SAMPLE_NAME\_13_VARIANT_CALLING/$SAMPLE_NAME\_indel_0.25freq_p0.001_qual_20.vcf","description":"","os_name":"Linux","os_version":"","can_edit":true,"step_guid":"E41CF440ECA211E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","command":""}}],"guid":"E41CF440ECA211E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","id":684412,"previous_guid":"BB470150ECA211E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","section":"SNP and INDEL variant calling using VarScan and SAMTOOLS"}
steps.section: SNP and INDEL variant calling using VarScan and SAMTOOLS
VCF QC of SNP and INDEL files using rtg-tools

steps.data:
{"blocks":[{"key":"8l0ab","text":"ANNOVAR reference assembly 65) with reference hg19","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"86ora","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"f7jni","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":5154,"guid":"B853E390ECA311E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","align":null,"name":"mkdir -p $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/Report_$SAMPLE_NAME\_13_VARIANT_CALLING/annotated_annovar

perl $SOFTWARE_PATH/annovar/convert2annovar.pl -format vcf4 $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/Report_$SAMPLE_NAME\_13_VARIANT_CALLING/$SAMPLE_NAME\_snp_0.25freq_p0.001_qual_20.vcf > $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/Report_$SAMPLE_NAME\_13_VARIANT_CALLING/annotated_annovar/$SAMPLE_NAME\_snp_0.25freq_p0.001_qual_20.vcf.avinput

perl $SOFTWARE_PATH/annovar/convert2annovar.pl -format vcf4 $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/Report_$SAMPLE_NAME\_13_VARIANT_CALLING/$SAMPLE_NAME\_indel_0.25freq_p0.001_qual_20.vcf > $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/Report_$SAMPLE_NAME\_13_VARIANT_CALLING/annotated_annovar/$SAMPLE_NAME\_indel_0.25freq_p0.001_qual_20.vcf.avinput

perl $SOFTWARE_PATH/annovar/table_annovar.pl $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/Report_$SAMPLE_NAME\_13_VARIANT_CALLING/$SAMPLE_NAME\_snp_0.25freq_p0.001_qual_20.vcf $SOFTWARE_PATH/annovar/humandb/ -buildver hg19 -out $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/Report_$SAMPLE_NAME\_13_VARIANT_CALLING/annotated_annovar/$SAMPLE_NAME\_snp_annovar_annotation -remove -protocol refGene,cytoBand,genomicSuperDups,esp6500siv2_all,1000g2015aug_all,1000g2015aug_eur,exac03,avsnp147,dbnsfp30a -operation g,r,r,f,f,f,f,f,f -nastring . -vcfinput

perl $SOFTWARE_PATH/annovar/table_annovar.pl $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/Report_$SAMPLE_NAME\_13_VARIANT_CALLING/$SAMPLE_NAME\_indel_0.25freq_p0.001_qual_20.vcf $SOFTWARE_PATH/annovar/humandb/ -buildver hg19 -out $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/Report_$SAMPLE_NAME\_13_VARIANT_CALLING/annotated_annovar/$SAMPLE_NAME\_indel_annovar_annotation -remove -protocol refGene,cytoBand,genomicSuperDups,esp6500siv2_all,1000g2015aug_all,1000g2015aug_eur,exac03,avsnp147,dbnsfp30a -operation g,r,r,f,f,f,f,f,f -nastring . -vcfinput","description":"","os_name":"Linux","os_version":"","can_edit":true,"step_guid":"99A40DD0ECA311E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","command":""}}],"guid":"99A40DD0ECA311E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","id":684414,"previous_guid":"768BADD0ECA311E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","section":"SNP AND INDEL variant annotation using ANNOVAR"}
steps.section: SNP AND INDEL variant annotation using ANNOVAR

steps.data:
{"blocks":[{"key":"aqgd2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3qdk9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1aire","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cra11","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"cfnm4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":5155,"guid":"07126D80ECA411E89F1E5FCF6C92CDA2","align":null,"name":"rm $SAMPLE_PATH/$SAMPLE_NAME/$SAMPLE_NAME\_R1.sai
